data.title: NBCUniversal Together
data.meta_description: Tap into a diverse audience with the #1 network for primetime live viewership. Discover audience metrics and premium content.
data.text:
Source:

Linear Hours & Hours Streamed Across Platforms: Nielsen Media Research, USA (1/1/23-12/31/23), L+35, P2+. Total Day Viewing. (2) NBCU DAVD, (1/1/23-12/31/23). FEP & VOD only.

Social Video Views: Talkwalker Social Content Ratings, STD: 9/25/23-4/14/24. Total Day. Linear Tracking Window. Cable-National Networks. No Sports Events or Specials. Bravo Claim: Reality Genre. Excludes sports networks. Program claim excludes special event programming. E! Claim: YTD (1/1/24-4/14/24). Total Day, Reality Genre, Live or New.

Source:

#1 Cable Entertainment Network in Prime: Nielsen Media Research, season to date based on C3 data (9/25/23-2/4/24). Ranked against all ad-supported cable, excluding sports and news. Program ranker excludes series with only 1 telecast. Prime (M-Sa 8-11P, Su 7-11P). Reach: Nielsen Media Research, L+7, 1-min qual. Average monthly reach (9/25/2023 – 1/28/2024), based on calendar months. Includes: Bravo E!, Oxygen, Universal Kids, USA, CNBC Prime. All nets based on total day except CNBC Prime (7P-2A M-F, 8A-2A Sa-Su

Top 5: Nielsen Media Research, season to date based on C3 data (9/25/23-3/31/24). Ranked against all ad-supported cable, excluding sports and news. Program ranker excludes series with only 1 telecast. Prime (M-Sa 8-11P, Su 7-11P). Excludes Repeats. Reach: Nielsen Media Research, L+7, 1-min qual. Average monthly reach (9/25/2023 – 3/31/2024), based on calendar months. Includes: Bravo E!, Oxygen, Universal Kids, USA, CNBC Prime. All nets based on total day except CNBC Prime (7P-2A M-F, 8A-2A Sa-Su).).

#1 Network for Same-Day Social Engagement: Talkwalker Social Content Ratings, STD: 9/25/23-2/18/24. Total Day. Linear Tracking Window. Cable-National Networks. No Sports Events or Specials. Bravo Claim: Reality Genre. Excludes sports networks. Program claim excludes special event programming
